{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = Tomed elvenwand projectile | class = GoldWandFX2 | game = Heretic | spawnid = 152 | spawnname = T_POWERWANDBIGGERBLAST }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:GoldWandFX1|GoldWandFX1]]→GoldWandFX2

As powerful as the [[Classes:GoldWandPuff2|hitscans]] that accompanies it. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR GoldWandFX2 : {{Class|GoldWandFX1}} { {{Property|Speed}} 18 {{Property|Damage}} 1 {{Property|DeathSound}} "" States { Spawn: FX01 CD 6 Bright Loop } }
